#### Reason for change

JIRA ticket: VIS-

If no JIRA ticket exists for the change, write a short description of the reason for the changes proposed.

#### Guidelines

- Format of pull request title should be `<JIRA Issue Number>: <Description>`, e.g. `SQUAD-9999: Increase container memory`
- If no JIRA ticket exists to document the change, the format should be `NO-TICKET: <Description>`, e.g. `NO-TICKET: Increase container memory`
